summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4787 for the improvement of 29th Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to West Ray Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 55282, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
